reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan well-made and appreciate its beautiful duster style that looks and feels expensive. Customers praise its comfort, with no itching reported, and its soft, luxurious feel against the skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater
items.body: **GRACE KARIN Essential Solid Open Front Maxi Long Knitted Cardigan Sweater Review** I recently purchased the GRACE KARIN Essential Solid Open Front Maxi Long Knitted Cardigan Sweater, and it has quickly become a go-to piece in my wardrobe! This cardigan is the perfect blend of style, comfort, and versatility, making it an essential addition for any fashion lover. **Design and Style:** The open front design of this cardigan is chic and modern, allowing for easy layering over various outfits. The maxi length adds a touch of elegance and sophistication, making it suitable for both casual and dressier occasions. I love how it drapes beautifully, providing a flattering silhouette that complements my figure. **Comfort and Quality:** The knitted fabric is incredibly soft and cozy, perfect for those cooler days. It feels luxurious against the skin without being too heavy. The quality of the material is impressive; it has held up well after several washes, maintaining its shape and softness. **Versatility:** One of the best features of this cardigan is its versatility. It pairs perfectly with everything from jeans and a t-shirt to a dress or leggings. I can easily dress it up with accessories for a night out or keep it casual for a day of running errands. It’s the kind of piece that transitions effortlessly from day to night. **Color Options:** I appreciate that the GRACE KARIN cardigan comes in a variety of solid colors, making it easy to find one that suits my style. I opted for a classic black, which goes with almost anything, but I’m tempted to get a few more colors to expand my collection! **Overall Impression:** The GRACE KARIN Essential Solid Open Front Maxi Long Knitted Cardigan Sweater is a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their wardrobe. Its combination of comfort, style, and versatility makes it an outstanding choice for any season. I highly recommend this cardigan to anyone seeking a stylish layering piece that is both functional and fashionable! Read more
items.author: S. kilpatrick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, not bulky at all, perfect wardrobe piece, extremely versatile
items.body: 5'8" 145 lbs, ordered a Medium This is my all time favorite. It can dress up anything, from walking the dog to your favorite jeans, skirts, etc....just a very nice, elegant touch for chilly weather. Smaller guage knit so there's no extra bulk. Pockets are a plus too. A go to for sure. Made well! Read more
items.author: Diane L. Courtemanche

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight duster
items.body: This is a lightweight material duster that is attractive and easy to wear. I appreciate the pockets and love the color. It fits fairly true to size. Read more
items.author: DEPope

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice product and great fit for taller ladies.
items.body: Nice and long, a bit thin for winter but good quality and fit especially for taller ladies. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Versatile
items.body: I have so many of these cardigans. They are comfortable, true to size. Stylish. Versatile. Have pockets which I love. These are good quality. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft so wonderful
items.body: This is a thinner sweater, but it's still warm.It flatters and I feel like a fat toad most days.But I really like the way.This fits it drapes perfect.I am absolutely adoring it.Have almost wondered every day since i've had itThis is a thinner sweater, but it's still warm.It flatters and I feel like a fat toad most days.But I really like the way.This fits it drapes perfect.I am absolutely adoring it.Have almost wondered everyday since i've had it Read more
items.author: Darlene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight cotton blend warm!
items.body: Love this cardigan! It is true to size, warm and lightweight. Its a cotten polyester blend I think which makes it more durable than a heavyweight cotton cardigan. No buttons or zippers and the sleeves have cuffs. Im not crazy about the cuffs but they are not that noticeable so I can live with that. Overall good quality and well worth the price. Read more
items.author: Tammy Isakson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great light weight cardigan
items.body: This is a great light weight, long cardigan. I bought one in black and one in tan. Looks great with jeans, dress pants, dresses and skirts. It is soft and I love having the pockets. Read more
items.author: DogMom74

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 2-navy Blue, Wine, Brown, Khaki Heather, 19-beige, Deep Green, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Apricot, 6-ivory, Coffee, 1-black, Light Pink, Light Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
